step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your shoulders relaxed as you begin the roll.
Nice movement! Focus on squeezing your shoulder blades together as you roll them back and down.
Great job on the first set! Remember to breathe deeply when pulling your shoulders back.
Second set starting well. Ensure your shoulders stay down and relaxed.
Excellent control! Continue to focus on the circular motion, bringing the shoulder blades together.
Fantastic finish! You're doing a great job regaining shoulder mobility and supporting lymphatic flow.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the shoulder rolls! Remember to gently squeeze your shoulder blades back and down in a smooth circle. Take a deep breath as you pull back to help with oxygen flow. Keep up the excellent work on these movements!
